name: Nekotchi
description:
Description

Nekotchi is a simple, somewhat-idle Tamagotchi-esque game where you take care of a feline friend called "Dee". Basically it's a game about our cat, so you better keep him alive.

Keeping him healthy and happy will earn you LOVE points.

Controls

You only need the Left Mouse-Button for this game. The on-screen buttons are as follows:

  • Status: lets you check information about the cat
  • Food: give that precious, savoury deliciousness to the guy
  • Play: play with him, it makes him happy
  • Medicine: sometimes he might get sick, pop on some pills to heal that shit up
  • Wash: wash up if he gets dirty
  • Clean up: if he dares to take a dump on the carpet
  • Sleep: order his ass to sleep
Known bugs
  • [FIXED 21.04.2020] Sometimes he might decide to walk off the mortal plane (the home scene). Just like the real Dee.
  • [FIXED 21.04.2020] The UI is not responsive, so resizing (and probably mobile) will screw it up.
